subject: Heel plate
description_text:
So I bought the Pro ultra pedal set minus the mounting plate, because my
pedal can be bolted directly to. Now I can't buy the lighted heel plate? I
see the heel plate for sale, but nowhere do I see where the lighted heel
plate can be purchased. Does it come with the mounting plate assembly?

conversations.body_text: Hello, you may purchase two copies of this link and add a note specifying your requirements. We shall dispatch the relevant sections to you. They will include the corresponding accessories, so please rest assured.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/carbon-fiber-heel-plate-1
